person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: Oh no! Stress can be tough. There's a calming turtle named Bruno who specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn some relaxing techniques from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno will share some fantastic relaxation techniques with you. Let’s hop on over to meet him!
